item.title: BJP protests against ethanol project
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In Jogulamba Gadwal districtâ€™s Pedda Dhanwada villagein the Rajolimandal, BJP conducted a public awareness programme on the harmful effects of ethanol factory proposed in the area.
Party district president S. Ramachandra Reddy warned of severe public backlash if plans to build an ethanol factory were not halted. He expressed concern that future generations would have to bear the consequences of pollution. Reddy accused officials of taking bribes and misleading people to let the factory ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
